comments.author: aew
comments.body: You could just buy a virtual visa like myprepaidcenter card and pay by your self. .If you cannot I sent you a pm

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Why not make the order from the user that will pay via PayPal for you? I think it’s better that way. Linking to an account that isn’t yours is sketchy. If you are just looking for paying for the service, then maybe the user with the PayPal use it with his/her fiverr account.

comments.author: ChrissB
comments.body: I can do this for you, escrow is fine. I will need some fees though because there's PayPal charge and I need some % for myself for doing this. Let me know and if you have a telegram we can discuss.

comments.author: edgycorner
comments.body: How much do you need?I have a Fiverr account with 15 dollars, which I haven't used for like 1-2 years.I can change the E-mail and give it to you. If that's the amount you are looking for. Or like aew suggested, buy a VCC with BTC. Load it and use it.
